content: **note ** this pattern is available for free on my blog broadway knit hat is the perfect projects for beginners who know basic stitches and how to knit in rounds i have done this hat for my husband but if you take for example white color you will get a perfect woman version **video tutorial ** https //www youtube com/watch v=ihs3crza3wq you are welcome to follow my **youtube** channel https //www youtube com/channel/ucwqwxlyqk9vjedzoiqjw-wa … **facebook** https //www facebook com/groups/crazyhands net/ **instagram ** https //www instagram com/amurushka_amur/
